description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get your war gear ready and join your friends on the battlefield in this fast-paced twin-stick military shooter. Up to 8 players online, Deathmatch & Team Deathmatch modes, and an array of characters and weapons to choose from.
